Vps_M2mVpeParams Struct Reference
VPS Driver API » M2M API » M2M VPE API

VPE parameters used in set/get VPE params IOCTL. More...

#include <vps_m2mVpe.h>

Data Fields

Fvid2_Format inFmt

Detailed Description

VPE parameters used in set/get VPE params IOCTL.

Field Documentation

UInt32 Vps_M2mVpeParams::chNum

Channel number to which to apply or get the parameter. This should br 0 to (numCh - 1), which is passed during create time.

Vps_DeiConfig Vps_M2mVpeParams::deiCfg

Pointer to the deinterlacer configuration used for VPE drivers.

Fvid2_Format Vps_M2mVpeParams::inFmt

Frame format for the input frame to the VPE. Details as below

chNum:
Set to the channel number - same as 'chNum' of this structure.

width:
Input width, in pixels.

height:
Input height, in lines.

pitch:
Pitch in bytes between two lines. Pitch can be specified separately for every plane. And should be aligned to VPS_BUFFER_ALIGNMENT.

fieldMerged:
Not used - Set to FALSE.

dataFormat:
Input Data format, valid options are
FVID2_DF_YUV422I_YUYV,
FVID2_DF_YUV420SP_UV,
FVID2_DF_YUV422SP_UV,
For valid values see Fvid2_DataFormat.

scanFormat:
In case of interlaced input set this to FVID2_SF_INTERLACED.
In case of progressive input set this to FVID2_SF_PROGRESSIVE.

bpp: Not used, set to 0 or default.

UInt32 Vps_M2mVpeParams::inMemType

VPDMA Memory type for the VPE input frame. For valid values see Vps_VpdmaMemoryType.

Fvid2_Format Vps_M2mVpeParams::outFmt

Frame format for the output frame to the VPE. Details as below

chNum:
Set to the channel number - same as 'chNum' of this structure.

width:
Output width, in pixels.

height:
Output height, in lines.

pitch:
Pitch in bytes between two lines. Pitch can be specified separately for every plane. And should be aligned to VPS_BUFFER_ALIGNMENT.

fieldMerged:
Not used - Set to FALSE.

dataFormat:
Output Data format, valid options are
FVID2_DF_YUV422I_YUYV,
FVID2_DF_YUV420SP_UV,
FVID2_DF_YUV422SP_UV,
FVID2_DF_RGB24_888,
FVID2_DF_YUV444I,
For valid values see Fvid2_DataFormat.

scanFormat:
For both deinterlacing and progressive bypass mode, set this to FVID2_SF_PROGRESSIVE.

bpp: Not used, set to 0 or default.

UInt32 Vps_M2mVpeParams::outMemType

VPDMA Memory type for the VPE writeback output frame. For valid values see Vps_VpdmaMemoryType.

Vps_ScConfig Vps_M2mVpeParams::scCfg

Pointer to the scaler parameters like crop and scaler type for the scaler in VPE path.

Fvid2_CropConfig Vps_M2mVpeParams::scCropCfg

Pointer to the cropping configuration for the VPE scaler.

Vps_SubFrameParams Vps_M2mVpeParams::subFramePrms

SubFrame mode parameters.
